name: Siderise and Insulation QA been completed?
Blue butyl pad with butyl tape present
Screw size is as per drawing and on the timber studs
Adjacent lengths must be tightly butted
Screwed to the F-bracket as per drawing
Expansion joining if needed, minimum 4 mm
Hanging pin aligned and fixed to rail as per drawing
Panel seating perfectly onto the hanging pin. Plumb and straight
Confirm main contractor has inspected area prior to hand over.
Confirm written communication stating main contractor has accepted has been received.
